entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
